name: polssatN
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: syldan(wcel(c0, chlt), wss(c1, c2), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpsubsp, c0)))
stmt.pretty: syldan(c0 ∈ HL, c1 ⊆ c2, (c3 ` c1)⊆ c2, (c3 ` c1)∈(PSubSp ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpsubsp, c0)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpsubsp, c0))), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wss(c1, c2)), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpsubsp, c0))), wss(cfv(c3, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: polsubN(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cpsubsp, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chlt), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cfv(c3, c1), cfv(cpsubsp, c0)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cpsubsp, c0), cfv(cpsubsp, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpolN, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ HL ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c3 ` c1)∈(PSubSp ` c0))
⊣ c2 =(Atoms ` c0)
⊣ (PSubSp ` c0)=(PSubSp ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(_|_P ` c0)

cumulated.origin:

-| wceq(c2, cfv(catm, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cpsubsp, c0), cfv(cpsubsp, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpolN, c0))

comment: The polarity of a set of atoms is a set of atoms. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
